Asking for rep is against the rules and will get yours reset. Okay… for your problem;

Change it to yours.
Save
compile

finished[/quote]

Just follow what he says. That will fix it…

item.title: How to change this
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

fredfredh:

um…i though these fourm bit was for um…helping poeple and yes i am ew to this sorta server stuff thats why this is help section so poeple can help you know not to a buse and say nasty things

Ok, I’m not being nasty, and I’m not attacking you in anyway. I’m just saying this. Listen for a second; If you log on to your server and you see “welcome to whateverscape” and you want to change that text, what would the person with common sense do? They would open their files and search for the text “welcome to whateverscape”. Maybe since you’re new, you wouldn’t know which file exactly because there’s so many. But before I came here asking for help, I knew how to do this because it’s not coding, it common sense ctrl+f searching. Not only that, but I bet you if you searched on these forums “changing login message” you would come up with 12 hundred different results because that’s all these forums are flooded with. I really hope you learn how to code, and good. Not just finding and changing. Leechers suck.

Also: Your email really made me laugh because it’s so relevant to this topic.

Read full topic
